snippet.title: When Lincoln was shot, and Andrew Johnson was then president. How come there was no vice president?

snippet.title: Who was Lincoln's vice president and what role did he play in the administration?

snippet.title: How did southerners feel about Abraham Lincoln?
Why did Abraham Lincoln choose Andrew Johnson as his Vice President?
snippet.description: It seems illogical, their opinions and ideals for the U.S's future were worlds apart.

snippet.title: Can you please explain the assassination of Abraham Lincoln?
snippet.description: Can u please.please,please help me??????? THANKX....... so much!!!!!!!!!!!!

snippet.title: What is the congressman's name that was next in line when lincoln was assisated in 1800's?
snippet.description: he was not elected he was appointed for one day as president

snippet.title: Who had Abraham Lincoln as a vice president?
snippet.description: ...president, everybody knows. James Buchanan didn't have Lincoln as vice president. So who was he Vice president for?
